segments.text: Suddenly, I see the water pouring out of the sink—wow, that's unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on, but the woman's just calmly drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, and she hasn't even flinched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, a boy's up on a stool grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet's open wide, jar right there—didn't expect that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's tilting, but he's steady so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Little girl reaching up, like she's in on the surprise party.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is peaceful, contrasting this indoor surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, but chaos with the overflow—who saw that coming?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so absorbed, unaware of the whole sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment caught me off guard, but it's intriguing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Can't believe the drain isn't working either.
segments.speaker: PAR
